import React from 'react'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/esm/Button'; import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card'; import ListGroup from 'react-bootstrap/ListGroup'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Skeleton } from '@mui/material'; function OrderDetails({ data, smallScreen, loading }) { return ( {(loading ? Array.from(new Array(2)) : data?.products)?.map( (item, index) => ( {item ? (
{smallScreen && item.name.length > 11 ? `${item.name.slice(0, 11)}...` : item.name}
{item.category === 'food' ? `${item.quantity} plate` : item.category === 'meat' ? ` ${item.quantity} pieces` : `${item.quantity} pieces `} ({`N${item.price}`})
{!smallScreen && (
)}
) : (
)} ) )} ); } export default OrderDetails;
